text: Gov. Tim Walz and Minnesota AG Keith Ellison will testify before Congress - Politico

text: Luigi Mangione will not face death penalty, judge rules - CNN
fullText: Luigi Mangione will not face the death penalty for allegedly killing UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson in December 2024, a federal district judge ruled Friday, dealing a blow to US prosecutors who were adamant about pursuing the ultimate sentence.

text: Ford to record $600 million pretax pension charge in fourth quarter - CNBC
